articles.title: IOC lines up French Alps, Salt Lake City to host 2030, 2034 Winter Olympics | CBC Sports
articles.description: Salt Lake City being preferred as a shoo-in to host the 2034 Winter Olympics was expected. The surprise was the IOC favouring the French Alps bid for the 2030 edition on Wednesday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Sports Illustrated accused of passing AI articles off as human-created content
articles.description: Sports Illustrated is being accused of publishing product reviews from authors that don't actually exist and had AI-generated headshots. The magazine's parent company has denied the allegations, saying the articles were written and edited by humans from a thi…
